column4: Is anyone able to help me with a free disk space issue? I downloaded around 10GB of data onto a drive overnight last night, and I transferred it to another computer today and then deleted it, but the space does not seem to have been reclaimed. And I've searched for 'trash' folders and have found none
I have also run du on the drive to find out the amount of space the contents occupies, and it returned 1325701944, but when I run df it says I have used 1335751040
so there is roughly a 10GB discrepancy
